subsection.name: Web Browsing
subsection.p:
To browse via the web use the ViewVC interface:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/syncope/trunk/

Or to browse the source tree directly:
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk/

subsection.name: Checking out
subsection.p: The source code can be checked out anonymously over HTTP by doing: svn co http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk syncope
Committers can check out the code over HTTPS: svn co https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk syncope
Committers needing to check out a specific branch can do so as follows: svn co https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/branches/{branch name} syncope

section.name: Using GIT
section.p: Apache also maintains a git mirror of the svn repository. You can clone the git repository via: git clone git://git.apache.org/syncope.git or git clone http://git.apache.org/syncope.git

For committers/developers interested in using git for Syncope trunk development, Apache has some documentation:
http://www.apache.org/dev/git.html
http://wiki.apache.org/general/GitAtApache
List of mirrored repositories: http://git.apache.org/
